UI_visible_response: In general, China's economy is in a good development trend. The Chinese government has also introduced a series of policies to promote high - quality economic development, further optimize the business environment, stimulate market vitality, and promote the continuous growth of the economy.
traffic_visible_response: 正在搜索找到 6 篇资料参考No, China's economy is not slowing down. Instead, it is showing a trend of continuous recovery and improvement. The following are the specific manifestations:- **Overall economic growth is stable**: In 2024, China's GDP was 134.9084 trillion yuan, an increase of 5.0% over the previous year. The growth rate is stable and ranks among the top in the world's major economies. From the quarterly data, the GDP growth rate was 5.3% in the first quarter, 4.7% in the second quarter, 4.6% in the third quarter, and 5.4% in the fourth quarter. The economic growth rate in the fourth quarter rebounded significantly, indicating strong economic resilience and development momentum.- **Recovery of industrial enterprises**: From October 2024 to February 2025, the sales revenue of manufacturing enterprises increased by 3.6% year - on - year, and that of equipment manufacturing enterprises increased by 8.7%. The sales revenue of high - tech industries increased by 10.6%, of which high - tech services and high - tech manufacturing increased by 11.7% and 9% respectively. The sales revenue of the digital economy core industry increased by 5.6%. These data show that China's industrial enterprises, especially those in emerging industries, are developing well, and the new - quality productive forces are growing steadily.- **Active market consumption**: From October 2024 to February 2025, the retail sales of household audio - visual equipment such as televisions and daily - use household appliances such as refrigerators increased by 23.3% and 56.1% year - on - year respectively. Furniture retail and sanitary ware retail related to home decoration increased by 28.5% and 17.4% respectively. Driven by policies and market demand, residents' consumption demand is gradually being released, and the consumer market is becoming more active.- **Sound development of green economy**: From October 2024 to February 2025, the sales revenue of new energy, energy - saving, environmental - protection and other green technology promotion services increased by 29.3%, 26.8% and 12.1% year - on - year respectively. The sales revenue of clean energy industries such as solar energy, biomass energy and wind power increased by 26.7%, 10.9% and 6.1% respectively. The green economy is developing rapidly, which helps China achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality and promotes the transformation of the economic development mode.In general, China's economy is in a good development trend. The Chinese government has also introduced a series of policies to promote high - quality economic development, further optimize the business environment, stimulate market vitality, and promote the continuous growth of the economy.
